entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
